ComicInfo.Summary:
Trouble in paradise. Malcolm and Maxine on their honeymoon in hell.
Note: Includes the back-up comics:
Identity Crisis, by Erik Larsen, Frank Fosco, and Adam Pruett. 6 pages. Ultiman, by Ecker, Carlson & Simpson Truth Serum, by Jon Adams
